abstract: A report recommended that all brokerage firms assess their security and review the safeguards put in place by their vendors, after finding that a small minority of firms are not yet doing so.

headline.main: Brokerage Firms Worry About Breaches by Hackers, Not Terrorists
headline.print_headline: Firms Wary of Breaches by Hackers, Not Terrorists

snippet: A report recommended that all brokerage firms assess their security and review the safeguards put in place by their vendors, after finding that a small minority of firms are not yet doing so.
